             List<LockPatternView.Cell> pattern)
        Encrypts pattern.
        Parameters:
        context - the context.
        pattern - the pattern in the form of a list of LockPatternView.Cell.

        the encrypted char array of the pattern.

                                 char[] encryptedPattern)

        encryptedPattern - the encrypted pattern.
        Returns:
        the original pattern.
